description: Deletes statistics for Gremlin and openCypher (property graph) data. When invoking this operation in a Neptune cluster that has IAM authentication enabled, the IAM user or role making the request must have a policy attached that allows the neptune-db:DeleteStatistics IAM action in that cluster.

nested_items.name: statusCode
nested_items.description: The HTTP response code: 200 if the delete was successful, or 204 if there were no statistics to delete.

nested_items.name: active
nested_items.description: The current status of the statistics.

nested_items.name: statisticsId
nested_items.description: The ID of the statistics generation run that is currently occurring.
